title: Frontend
description: Acting as a Frontend Developer I use stacks like AngularJS, VueJS & React to build pages on the user side.

title: Backend
description: Acting as a Backend Developer I use the Spring Boot with Java to manage the application's business rules.

title: Database
description: Acting in the data layer I use stacks like MySQL and PostgreSQL to manage the application data.

title: Cloud
description: Acting in the cloud layer I use stacks like AWS & Google Cloud Manager to manage the cloud application.

title: DevOps
description: Acting as a DevOps I use the Jenkins, Docker & CI-CD programs to manage the development workflow.

title: General
description: Acting as an employer I commonly create & update the documentation and I love to automate some stuffs.
